name: iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and a versatile triple-camera system for incredible photos and videos.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22
description: The Samsung Galaxy S22 is a powerhouse with its Exynos 2200 chip, vibrant Dynamic AMOLED display, and versatile camera setup.

name: Motorola Moto G7
description: The Moto G7 offers a balance of performance and affordability with its large display, clean software, and long battery life.

name: Nokia 9 PureView
description: The Nokia 9 PureView stands out with its innovative penta-lens camera system and clean Android One software experience.

name: iPhone 13
description: The iPhone 13 is a versatile smartphone with a powerful A15 Bionic chip, dual-camera system, and all-day battery life.

name: Samsung Galaxy A52
description: The Samsung Galaxy A52 offers a great display, impressive camera performance, and a sleek design at an affordable price.

name: Motorola Edge+
description: The Motorola Edge+ is a flagship phone with a high-refresh-rate display, powerful Snapdragon 865 chip, and versatile camera setup.

name: Nokia 8.3 5G
description: The Nokia 8.3 5G is a 5G-enabled phone with a clean Android experience, a large display, and a robust build quality.
